mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ts_stdt_dgem_hist.select */ SELECT stdt_no /* stdt_no null numeric */ ,dgem_hist_seq /* dgem_hist_seq null numeric */ ,loc_hist_no /* loc_hist_no null numeric */ ,curr_lat_val /* curr_lat_val null numeric */ ,curr_lon_val /* curr_lon_val null numeric */ ,loc_mesu_dttm /* loc_mesu_dttm null character(14) */ ,dgem_idx /* dgem_idx null numeric */ ,dgem_stat_cd /* dgem_stat_cd null character varying(20) */ ,act_div_cd /* act_div_cd null character varying(20) */ ,hbit_stat_cd /* hbit_stat_cd null character varying(20) */ ,plc_clss_cd /* plc_clss_cd null character varying(20) */ ,temp_stat_cd /* temp_stat_cd null character varying(20) */ ,judg_no /* judg_no null numeric */ ,rmrk /* rmrk null character varying(4000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt null character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm null character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id null character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt null character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm null character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id null character varying(20) */ FROM ts_stdt_dgem_hist WHERE 1 = 1 AND stdt_no = #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no null numeric */ AND dgem_hist_seq = #{dgemHistSeq} /* dgem_hist_seq null numeric */

) VALUES ( #{stdtNo} /* stdt_no null numeric */ #{dgemHistSeq} /* dgem_hist_seq null numeric */

,#{tempStatCd} /* temp_stat_cd null character varying(20) */
,#{judgNo} /* judg_no null numeric */

,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt null character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm null character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id null character varying(20) */

,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id null character varying(20) */
)
